mapper.select: SELECT ID, SPA_CD, SPA_REQ_CD, SPA_NAME, TYPE_NAME, BUSI_NAME, RPRSN_NAME, STR_TIME, END_TIME, USE_HRS, ONE_INTRO, AREA_NAME, SPC_AREA_NAME,RSV_NOTES,DTL_INTRO, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIEW_SPA_FEEDCOUNT WHERE SPA_REQ_CD=M.SPA_REQ_CD ) AS FEEDCOUNT FROM VIEW_SPA_MY M WHERE SPA_REQ_CD = #{spa_req_cd}
SELECT SPA_REQ_CD, TAG_NAME FROM VIEW_SPA_TAG UNION ALL SELECT SPA_REQ_CD, ETC_TAG FROM VIEW_SPA_ETC_TAG WHERE SPA_REQ_CD = #{spa_req_cd}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM VIEW_SPA_MY WHERE CHECK_TYPE_CD LIKE #{check_type}
AND ${searchKey} LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
SELECT SPA_REQ_CD, TAG_NAME FROM VIEW_SPA_TAG UNION ALL SELECT SPA_REQ_CD, ETC_TAG FROM VIEW_SPA_ETC_TAG

SELECT ID, SPA_CD, SPA_REQ_CD, SPA_NAME, TYPE_NAME, BUSI_NAME, RPRSN_NAME, STR_TIME, END_TIME, USE_HRS, ONE_INTRO, AREA_NAME, SPC_AREA_NAME,RSV_NOTES,DTL_INTRO, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIEW_SPA_FEEDCOUNT WHERE SPA_REQ_CD=M.SPA_REQ_CD ) AS FEEDCOUNT FROM VIEW_SPA_MY M WHERE CHECK_TYPE='YES' AND ID= #{spa_id}

SELECT SPA_REQ_CD, SUM(FACILITY) AS FACILITY,SUM(KINDNESS) AS KINDNESS, SUM(PRICE) AS PRICE, SUM(LOCATION) AS LOCATION, SUM(NOISE) AS NOISE FROM VIEW_SPA_FEEDCOUNT WHERE ID= #{spa_id} GROUP BY SPA_REQ_CD
